journeys
& notes

an app for the spaces between

a journal for your
journeys

The road is a place of wonder and inspiration. From prosaic thoughts to bursts of creative brilliance, the journeys we take the ideas they inspire along the way are treasures worth protecting.

a community of
travellers

We see one another on our adventures: riding the bus, pacing the platform, quickly eating breakfast during a morning commute. For the briefest of moments we are together, a community on the train.

secrets and stories
of the road

Stones left by hikers pile into cairns showing a history of wayfarers long past. We each have own stories of the road and its secrets, and sometimes like stones, we leave these behind too, sharing our tales with those who travel.

What is journeys & notes about?

Journeys & Notes is a delightfully curious social app for the space between an origin and a destination. The road is long and lonely, but we help you share notes with fellow travelers along your journey. We're from Seattle and will be coming soon to a city near you.

Journeys & notes let's you check-in to the trips you take and communicate with others that have travelled nearby. So for example, if you're on the bus on your way from home to work, you check-in to the trip by specifying where you're starting, where you're going and how you're getting there. This unlocks an online commutity of people who have travelled on trips that start and end near yours. You can leave behind notes for your fellow travellers to read, and comment on other people's notes.

  • Each new cliff is taught,
    by ages of patient waves,
    how to keep its place.

  • Bottled message? No.
    The bottle is the message
    of journeys taken

  • Walk to the end of
    the northbound platform and wait—
    a car to yourself
